CustomField.description: Returns the sum of the points I've associated with picklist choices in two fields: Rank_of_Best_Advocate__c and Urgency_Driver_for_Q4_2006__c. This is used to try to estimate close likelihood.
CustomField.formula: CASE( Rank_of_Best_Advocate__c, "3) GC, Tech Partner, Other Partner", 3, "2) ED, COO or CFO", 2, "1) CIO, Records, Others reporting to ED", 1, "0) Below that", 0, -900) + CASE( Urgency_Driver_for_Q4_2006__c, "3) Partners' deadline - Merger by Jan 1, or similar", 3, "2) Administrator's deadline - IT project by Jan 1, or similar", 2, "1) IntApp's deadline - Dec 15 promotion, POC, etc", 1, "0) No agreed deadline yet - Trying to find one", 0, -90000)
CustomField.label: Q4 2006 Points
